Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice with cul; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; two added red bands; exterior: wall reserved; in handle zone, double saw-edged metope pattern between dilute lines; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis) (noted on Gardner's plate)
Curator's comments: In pencil on outside '60' or possibly '6a'.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 678, no. 371, pl. 20.5)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0999) (phase 2)
